films.title: The Ballad of the Tea Table
films.description: In a quiet town, a traveler and his remote partner-in-crime attempt to swindle two young homeowners out of a priceless piece of furniture.

films.title: Tigers and Sparrows
films.description: The manager of a college band hears a rumor he's getting fired and wanders into the strangest night of his life.
